meanings.definition: To produce or release an abnormally large number of eggs during a single menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit superovulates, releasing many eggs at once.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how some women superovulate more than others.
meanings.sent3: The hen superovulates so much, she could start an egg farm!
meanings.sent4: Her ovaries seemed to superovulate like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The fertility treatment caused her to superovulate, surprising everyone.

meanings.definition: The process of inducing a female animal to release an abnormally large number of eggs for fertilization.
meanings.sent1: The superovulation of cows is common in the dairy industry.
meanings.sent2: The vet explained the benefits of superovulation in breeding programs.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that the elephant's superovulation made her a star among the males.
meanings.sent4: In the world of animal husbandry, superovulation is a valuable technique.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the effects of superovulation on different species.
